input.sentences: the awards ceremony was on a monday .
we gave awards to each participant in the program .
these people all had a success story in them .

output.sentences: On Monday, an awards ceremony was held.
Many people received awards throughout the night.
It was an honor to recognize these successful people for the work they do.
Many different kinds of people received awards that night.
We are able to take a group picture of all the award winners.
